doc:
Rupert Crosse https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rupert_Crosse 0 For the British lawyer, see Rupert Cross.Rupert Crosse (November 29, 1927 – March 5, 1973) was an American television and film actor noted as the first African American to receive a nomination for a Best Supporting Actor Academy Award — for his role in the 1969 adaptation of William Faulkner's The Reivers. For the_British_lawyer , see Rupert_Cross.Rupert_Crosse ( November_29_,_1927 – March_5_,_1973 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actor noted as the_first_African_American to_receive a_nomination for a_Best_Supporting_Actor_Academy_Award — for his_role in the_1969_adaptation of William_Faulkner 's_The_Reivers .
